definitions.definition: a category of artistic composition, as in music or literature, characterized by similarities in form, style, or subject matter.
examples: category, class, classification, group, set, list; Moretype, sort, kind, breed, variety, style, model, school, stamp, cast, ilk "historical fiction is my favorite genre of literature"Moretype, sort, kind, breed, variety, style, model, school, stamp, cast, ilk historical fiction is my favorite genre of literature
